price: You cannot make the dead hear, nor can you make the deaf hear the call when they turn their backs and walk away.
arabic: فَإِنَّكَ لَا تُسۡمِعُ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ وَلَا تُسۡمِعُ ٱلصُّمَّ ٱلدُّعَآءَ إِذَا وَلَّوۡاْ مُدۡبِرِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
